tool_description: This api will test the strength of almost any password.
name: PASSWORD STRENGTH TESTER
title: PASSWORD STRENGTH TESTER

api_list.name: Password strength tester
api_list.description: Type your password in the parameter, be careful with including hashtags, it has a problem with them.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://password-strength-tester.p.rapidapi.com/password/password"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-strength-tester.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://password-strength-tester.p.rapidapi.com/password/{your_password}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-strength-tester.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
